verses.verse: Now in the twenty <S%H6242><s%> - fourth <S%H702><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of this month <S%H2320><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> were assembled <S%H622><s%> with fasting, <S%H6685><s%> and with sackcloth, <S%H8242><s%> and earth on them. <S%H127><s%>

The seed <S%H2233><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> separated <S%H914><s%> themselves from all foreigners, <S%H1121><s%> and stood <S%H5975><s%> and confessed <S%H3034><s%> their sins, <S%H2403><s%> and the iniquities <S%H5771><s%> of their fathers. <S%H1><s%>

They stood up <S%H6965><s%> in their place, <S%H5977><s%> and read <S%H7121><s%> in the book <S%H5612><s%> of the law <S%H8451><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> their God <S%H430><s%> a fourth part <S%H7243><s%> of the day; <S%H3117><s%> and a fourth part <S%H7243><s%> they confessed, <S%H3034><s%> and worshiped <S%H7812><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> their God. <S%H430><s%>

Then Jeshua, <S%H3442><s%> and Bani, <S%H1137><s%> Kadmiel, <S%H6934><s%> Shebaniah, <S%H7645><s%> Bunni, <S%H1138><s%> Sherebiah, <S%H8274><s%> Bani, <S%H1137><s%> and Chenani <S%H3662><s%> of the Levites <S%H3881><s%> stood up <S%H6965><s%> on the stairs, <S%H4608><s%> and cried <S%H2199><s%> with a loud <S%H1419><s%> voice <S%H6963><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> their God. <S%H430><s%>

Then the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> Jeshua, <S%H3442><s%> and Kadmiel, <S%H6934><s%> Bani, <S%H1137><s%> Hashabneiah, <S%H2813><s%> Sherebiah, <S%H8274><s%> Hodiah, <S%H1941><s%> Shebaniah, <S%H7645><s%> and Pethahiah, <S%H6611><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Stand up <S%H6965><s%> and bless <S%H1288><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> from everlasting <S%H5769><s%> to everlasting! <S%H5769><s%> Bessed <S%H1288><s%> be your glorious <S%H3519><s%> name, <S%H8034><s%> which is exalted <S%H7311><s%> above all blessing <S%H1293><s%> and praise! <S%H8416><s%>

You are Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> even you alone. <S%H6213><s%> You have made heaven, <S%H8064><s%> the heaven <S%H8064><s%> of heavens, <S%H8064><s%> with all their army, <S%H6635><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> and all things that are on it, <S%H3220><s%> the seas and all that is in them, <S%H2421><s%> and you preserve them all. <S%H6635><s%> The army of heaven <S%H8064><s%> worships you. <S%H7812><s%>

You are Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> who chose <S%H977><s%> Abram, <S%H87><s%> and brought him out <S%H3318><s%> of Ur <S%H218><s%> of the Chaldees, <S%H3778><s%> and gave <S%H7760><s%> him the name <S%H8034><s%> of Abraham, <S%H85><s%>

and found <S%H4672><s%> his heart <S%H3824><s%> faithful <S%H539><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you, <S%H3772><s%> and made a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with him to give <S%H5414><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of the Canaanite, <S%H3669><s%> the Hittite, <S%H2850><s%> the Amorite, <S%H567><s%> and the Perizzite, <S%H6522><s%> and the Jebusite, <S%H2983><s%> and the Girgashite, <S%H1622><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> it to his seed, <S%H2233><s%> and have performed <S%H6965><s%> your words; <S%H1697><s%> for you are righteous. <S%H6662><s%>
"You saw <S%H7200><s%> the affliction <S%H6040><s%> of our fathers <S%H1><s%> in Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and heard <S%H8085><s%> their cry <S%H2201><s%> by the Red <S%H5488><s%> Sea, <S%H3220><s%>

and showed <S%H5414><s%> signs <S%H226><s%> and wonders <S%H4159><s%> against Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and against all his servants, <S%H5650><s%> and against all the people <S%H5971><s%> of his land; <S%H776><s%> for you knew <S%H3045><s%> that they dealt proudly <S%H2102><s%> against them, <S%H6213><s%> and made a name <S%H8034><s%> for yourself, <S%H3117><s%> as it is this day.

You divided <S%H1234><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them, <S%H5674><s%> so that they went through the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> on the dry land; <S%H3004><s%> and you cast <S%H7993><s%> their pursuers <S%H7291><s%> into the depths, <S%H4688><s%> as a stone <S%H68><s%> into the mighty <S%H5794><s%> waters. <S%H4325><s%>

Moreover, <S%H5982><s%> in a pillar of cloud <S%H6051><s%> you led <S%H5148><s%> them by day; <S%H3119><s%> and in a pillar <S%H5982><s%> of fire <S%H784><s%> by night, <S%H3915><s%> to give them light <S%H215><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%> in which they should go. <S%H3212><s%>

"You came down <S%H3381><s%> also on Mount <S%H2022><s%> Sinai, <S%H5514><s%> and spoke <S%H1696><s%> with them from heaven, <S%H8064><s%> and gave <S%H5414><s%> them right <S%H3477><s%> ordinances <S%H4941><s%> and true <S%H571><s%> laws, <S%H8451><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> statutes <S%H2706><s%> and commandments, <S%H4687><s%>

and made known <S%H3045><s%> to them your holy <S%H6944><s%> Sabbath, <S%H7676><s%> and commanded <S%H6680><s%> them commandments, <S%H4687><s%> and statutes, <S%H2706><s%> and a law, <S%H8451><s%> by <S%H3027><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> your servant, <S%H5650><s%>

and gave <S%H5414><s%> them bread <S%H3899><s%> from the sky <S%H8064><s%> for their hunger, <S%H7458><s%> and brought forth <S%H3318><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> for them out of the rock <S%H5553><s%> for their thirst, <S%H6772><s%> and commanded <S%H559><s%> them that they should go in <S%H935><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which you had sworn <S%H3027><s%> to give them. <S%H5414><s%>
"But they and our fathers <S%H1><s%> dealt proudly <S%H2102><s%> and hardened <S%H7185><s%> their neck, <S%H6203><s%> didn't <S%H8085><s%> listen to your commandments, <S%H4687><s%>

and refused <S%H3985><s%> to obey, <S%H8085><s%> neither were they mindful <S%H2142><s%> of your wonders <S%H6381><s%> that you did <S%H6213><s%> among them, <S%H7185><s%> but hardened their neck, <S%H6203><s%> and in their rebellion <S%H4805><s%> appointed <S%H5414><s%> a captain <S%H7218><s%> to return <S%H7725><s%> to their bondage. <S%H5659><s%> But you are a God <S%H433><s%> ready to pardon, <S%H5547><s%> gracious <S%H2587><s%> and merciful, <S%H7349><s%> slow <S%H750><s%> to anger, <S%H639><s%> and abundant <S%H7227><s%> in loving kindness, <S%H2617><s%> and didn't <S%H5800><s%> forsake them.

Yes, <S%H6213><s%> when they had made them a molten <S%H4541><s%> calf, <S%H5695><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> <S%H430><s%> 'This is your God who brought you up <S%H5927><s%> out of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%>' and had committed <S%H6213><s%> awful <S%H1419><s%> blasphemies; <S%H5007><s%>

yet you in your manifold <S%H7227><s%> mercies <S%H7356><s%> didn't <S%H5800><s%> forsake them in the wilderness: <S%H4057><s%> the pillar <S%H5982><s%> of cloud <S%H6051><s%> didn't <S%H5493><s%> depart from over them by day, <S%H3119><s%> to lead <S%H5148><s%> them in the way; <S%H1870><s%> neither the pillar <S%H5982><s%> of fire <S%H784><s%> by night, <S%H3915><s%> to show them light, <S%H215><s%> and the way <S%H1870><s%> in which they should go. <S%H3212><s%>

You gave <S%H5414><s%> also your good <S%H2896><s%> Spirit <S%H7307><s%> to instruct <S%H7919><s%> them, <S%H4513><s%> and didn't withhold your manna <S%H4478><s%> from their mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and gave <S%H5414><s%> them water <S%H4325><s%> for their thirst. <S%H6772><s%>

"Yes, <S%H705><s%> forty years <S%H8141><s%> you sustained <S%H3557><s%> them in the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%> They lacked <S%H2637><s%> nothing. <S%H8008><s%> Their clothes didn't <S%H1086><s%> grow old, and their feet <S%H7272><s%> didn't <S%H1216><s%> swell.

Moreover you gave <S%H5414><s%> them kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> and peoples, <S%H5971><s%> which you allotted <S%H2505><s%> according to their portions. <S%H6285><s%> So they possessed <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Sihon, <S%H5511><s%> even the land <S%H776><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Heshbon, <S%H2809><s%> and the land <S%H776><s%> of Og <S%H5747><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Bashan. <S%H1316><s%>

You also multiplied <S%H7235><s%> their children <S%H1121><s%> as the stars <S%H3556><s%> of the sky, <S%H8064><s%> and brought <S%H935><s%> them into the land <S%H776><s%> concerning which you said <S%H559><s%> to their fathers, <S%H1><s%> that they should go in <S%H935><s%> to possess it. <S%H3423><s%>

"So the children <S%H1121><s%> went in <S%H935><s%> and possessed <S%H3423><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> and you subdued <S%H3665><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> the Canaanites, <S%H3669><s%> and gave <S%H5414><s%> them into their hands, <S%H3027><s%> with their kings, <S%H4428><s%> and the peoples <S%H5971><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> that they might do <S%H6213><s%> with them as they pleased. <S%H7522><s%>

They took <S%H3920><s%> fortified <S%H1219><s%> cities, <S%H5892><s%> and a rich <S%H8082><s%> land, <S%H127><s%> and possessed <S%H3423><s%> houses <S%H1004><s%> full <S%H4392><s%> of all good things, <S%H2898><s%> cisterns <S%H953><s%> dug <S%H2672><s%> out, <S%H3754><s%> vineyards, and olive <S%H2132><s%> groves, <S%H3978><s%> and fruit trees <S%H6086><s%> in abundance. <S%H7230><s%> So they ate, <S%H398><s%> were filled, <S%H7646><s%> became fat, <S%H8080><s%> and delighted <S%H5727><s%> themselves in your great <S%H1419><s%> goodness. <S%H2898><s%>

"Nevertheless they were disobedient, <S%H4784><s%> and rebelled <S%H4775><s%> against you, <S%H7993><s%> and cast your law <S%H8451><s%> behind <S%H310><s%> their back, <S%H1458><s%> and killed <S%H2026><s%> your prophets <S%H5030><s%> that testified <S%H5749><s%> against them to turn <S%H7725><s%> them again to you, <S%H6213><s%> and they committed awful <S%H1419><s%> blasphemies. <S%H5007><s%>

Therefore you delivered <S%H5414><s%> them into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of their adversaries, <S%H6862><s%> who distressed <S%H6887><s%> them. <S%H6256><s%> In the time of their trouble, <S%H6869><s%> when they cried <S%H6817><s%> to you, <S%H8085><s%> you heard from heaven; <S%H8064><s%> and according to your manifold <S%H7227><s%> mercies <S%H7356><s%> you gave <S%H5414><s%> them saviors <S%H3467><s%> who saved <S%H3467><s%> them out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of their adversaries. <S%H6862><s%>

But after they had rest, <S%H5117><s%> they did <S%H6213><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you; <S%H5800><s%> therefore left you them in the hand <S%H3027><s%> of their enemies, <S%H341><s%> so that they had the dominion <S%H7287><s%> over them; <S%H7725><s%> yet when they returned, and cried <S%H2199><s%> to you, <S%H8085><s%> you heard from heaven; <S%H8064><s%> and many <S%H7227><s%> times <S%H6256><s%> you delivered <S%H5337><s%> them according to your mercies, <S%H7356><s%>

and testified <S%H5749><s%> against them, <S%H7725><s%> that you might bring them again to your law. <S%H8451><s%> Yet they dealt proudly, <S%H2102><s%> and didn't <S%H8085><s%> listen to your commandments, <S%H4687><s%> but sinned <S%H2398><s%> against your ordinances, <S%H4941><s%> (which if a man <S%H120><s%> does, <S%H6213><s%> he shall live <S%H2421><s%> in them <S%H5414><s%>), turned their backs, <S%H3802><s%> stiffened <S%H7185><s%> their neck, <S%H6203><s%> and would not hear. <S%H8085><s%>

Yet many <S%H7227><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> you put up with them, <S%H5749><s%> and testified against them by your Spirit <S%H7307><s%> through <S%H3027><s%> your prophets. <S%H5030><s%> Yet would they not give <S%H5414><s%> ear. <S%H238><s%> Therefore you gave <S%H5414><s%> them into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the peoples <S%H5971><s%> of the lands. <S%H776><s%>

"Nevertheless in your manifold <S%H7227><s%> mercies <S%H7356><s%> you did <S%H6213><s%> not make a full end <S%H3617><s%> of them, <S%H5800><s%> nor forsake them; <S%H2587><s%> for you are a gracious and merciful <S%H7349><s%> God. <S%H410><s%>

Now therefore, <S%H430><s%> our God, the great, <S%H1419><s%> the mighty, <S%H1368><s%> and the awesome <S%H3372><s%> God, <S%H410><s%> who keeps <S%H8104><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%> and loving kindness, <S%H2617><s%> don't <S%H8513><s%> let all the travail seem little <S%H4591><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you, <S%H4672><s%> that has come on us, <S%H4428><s%> on our kings, on our princes, <S%H8269><s%> and on our priests, <S%H3548><s%> and on our prophets, <S%H5030><s%> and on our fathers, <S%H1><s%> and on all your people, <S%H5971><s%> since the time <S%H3117><s%> of the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Assyria <S%H804><s%> to this day. <S%H3117><s%>
However you are just <S%H6662><s%> in all that has come <S%H935><s%> on us; <S%H6213><s%> for you have dealt truly, <S%H6213><s%> but we have done wickedly; <S%H7561><s%>

neither have our kings, <S%H4428><s%> our princes, <S%H8269><s%> our priests, <S%H3548><s%> nor our fathers, <S%H1><s%> kept <S%H6213><s%> your law, <S%H8451><s%> nor listened <S%H7181><s%> to your commandments <S%H4687><s%> and your testimonies <S%H5715><s%> with which you testified against them. <S%H5749><s%>

For they have not served <S%H5647><s%> you in their kingdom, <S%H4438><s%> and in your great <S%H7227><s%> goodness <S%H2898><s%> that you gave <S%H5414><s%> them, <S%H7342><s%> and in the large and rich <S%H8082><s%> land <S%H776><s%> which you gave <S%H5414><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them, <S%H7725><s%> neither did they turn from their wicked <S%H7451><s%> works. <S%H4611><s%>

"Behold, <S%H5650><s%> we are servants this day, <S%H3117><s%> and as for the land <S%H776><s%> that you gave <S%H5414><s%> to our fathers <S%H1><s%> to eat <S%H398><s%> its fruit <S%H6529><s%> and its good, <S%H2898><s%> behold, <S%H5650><s%> we are servants in it.

It yields much <S%H7235><s%> increase <S%H8393><s%> to the kings <S%H4428><s%> whom you have set <S%H5414><s%> over us because of our sins: <S%H2403><s%> also they have power <S%H4910><s%> over our bodies, <S%H1472><s%> and over our livestock, <S%H929><s%> at their pleasure, <S%H7522><s%> and we are in great <S%H1419><s%> distress. <S%H6869><s%>

Yet for all this, <S%H3772><s%> we make a sure <S%H548><s%> covenant, <S%H3789><s%> and write it; <S%H8269><s%> and our princes, our Levites, <S%H3881><s%> and our priests, <S%H3548><s%> seal it. <S%H2856><s%>"
